entry.content:

Sep 15, 23:32 UTC

Scheduled - Start time : 15/09/2022 00:00 UTC

Service impact : Some customers may experience some loss of service during the operations.
Service improvement : A network equipment will be replaced.

entry.title: [RBX8][Network] - SNC Network equpement Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Oct 10, 21:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

entry.title: [SGP/MRS][Network] - Backbone notification
entry.content:
Oct 19, 02:22 UTC
Monitoring - Traffic is back to normal. There are no additional latency on EU/US traffic to Singapore.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Oct 19, 01:46 UTC
Identified - Start time : 19/10/2022 01:04 UTC
Service impact : A fiber cut was detected at one of our providers between Marseille and Singapore.
The traffic is currently rerouted in part which causes more latency and saturation on the traffic coming from the US and Europe to Singapore
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working with the provider to solve the incident
